name: SuperClaude WASM
description: WebAssembly development using two specialists â€” webassembly-specialist (WASM/WASI compilation, browser integration, edge deployment, cross-platform portability) and rust-systems-engineer (Rust-to-WASM toolchain, wasm-bindgen, memory management, performance optimization). Returns WASM modules with binding code and deployment strategies. Activates on "compile to WASM", "WebAssembly module", "WASI runtime", "Rust to browser".

permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_URL: URL of the SuperClaude bridge server that orchestrates multi-agent wave execution. Set to your self-hosted bridge URL.
permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_TOKEN: Shared authentication secret between OpenClaw and the bridge server. Prevents unauthorized agent execution.
